sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": " 

Consider the adjoining figure. It is given that KI is parallel to JL , and IK = 9 cm, IM = 7 cm, MJ = 9 cm, and ML = 10 cm. Now, calculate KM and JL .
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline
[Figure not drawn to scale] \\
 ", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 4, "step_txt": "$$\text{In the triangle $IKM$ and triangle $JLM$ we have}$$
\[
	\angle \input[s1v1]{} = \angle J 
\]
\[
	\angle \input[s1v2]{} \input[s1v3]{} \input[s1v4]{} = \angle JML 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 4, "step_txt": " $$\text{So, by using angle angle similarity we can write $\Delta IKM \sim \Delta JLM $}$$
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s2v1]{} \input[s2v2]{} }{ML } = \frac{IM }{MJ } = \frac{IK }{\input[s2v3]{} \input[s2v4]{} } 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 3, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{KM }{\input[s3v1]{} } = \frac{7 }{9 } = \frac{9 }{JL }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow KM = \frac{7 }{\input[s3v2]{} } \times 10 = 7.78 cm
\]

And
\[
	\Rightarrow JL = \frac{\input[s3v3]{} }{7 } \times 9 = 11.57 cm
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["I", "I", "M", "K"], "text": "$$\text{Since, KI is parallel to JL, therefore, by alternate interor angle property, we have \angle I = \angle J, also, since vertically opposite angles are equal, therefore, \angle IMK = \angle JML.}$$"}, {"data": ["K", "M", "J", "L"], "text": "$$\text{Sice, the ratio of corresponding sides in similar triangle is proportional, therefore, \frac{KM }{ML } = \frac{IM }{MJ } = \frac{IK }{JL }}$$"}, {"data": [10, 9, 9], "text": "$$\text{Putting the values in the previous equation we get $\frac{KM }{10 } = \frac{7 }{9 } = \frac{9 }{JL }$, which upon simplification gives us $KM = \frac{7 }{9 } \times 10 = 7.78 cm$ and $JL = \frac{9 }{7 } \times 9 = 11.57 cm$ "}]
